settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: How long will the product stay on? Will it run down my face if I sweat?
settings.answer: Style Edit Concealer Touch-up Spray is wind, rain, & sweat resistant, so it won't run. The temporary color will stay secure until your next shampoo!

settings.title: Does it feel sticky or heavy?
settings.answer: Nope! Once dried, hair will feel light and look refreshed. Our unique formula matches your hair’s shine, for the most natural look possible.

settings.title: Are your products natural?
settings.answer: Yes, our color-adaptive pigments are naturally derived and made in the USA.

settings.title: Where are your products manufactured?
settings.answer: Our products are proudly manufactured in the USA.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, all orders shipped within the United States qualify for free shipping.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, but shipping charges will apply. Please see our Shipping Policies page for more information.

settings.title: Do you accept returns?
settings.answer: Yes! Please contact us within 30 days of delivery if you wish to request a return. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. Please send us an email at customerservice@styleedit.com or call us at 1-855-695-1466.

settings.title: Don’t see your question here?
settings.answer:
We’re here to help! Please send us an email at customerservice@styleedit.com or call us at 1-855-695-1466.
We’re available to chat from Monday-Friday, 9am-5pm EST. If you leave us a message after normal business hours, we’ll get back to you ASAP!
